subject: Re: [junit] Writing unit test for eclipse swt project
msgSnippet: Asked same question at maven group and someone suggested a solution: http://www.nabble.com/Problem-of-resolving-eclipse-swt-linux-library-td19103219.html
messageBody:
Asked same question at maven group and someone suggested a solution:

http://www.nabble.com/Problem-of-resolving-eclipse-swt-linux-library-td19103219.html

However I haven't go to that far, I even just cannot make the test running
outside eclipse... and then I need to concentrate on my day work from the
open source project which I like to involve.
